HeroSection.header: Build Better Habits, Break the Bad Ones!
HeroSection.subtext: Momentum helps you develop positive habits, stay consistent, and track your progress with Al-driven insights and community support.

Authentication.sideText: Join thousands of people building better habits with Momentum! Create an account to track your progress, set goals, and stay motivated wherever you go.
Authentication.sideText-signup: Log in to Momentum and stay on track with your habits! Access your progress, set new goals, and keep yourself motivated—anytime, anywhere.
Authentication.signup-instructions: Fill out all the important information.

AboutUs.Au-Header: More Than Just a Habit Tracker, A Movement Toward Better Living!
AboutUs.Au-Subtext: At Momentum, we believe that small, consistent actions lead to extraordinary transformations. Whether you're building new habits or breaking old ones, we're here to support your journey every step of the way.
AboutUs.Mission-Text: To help you create meaningful, lasting habits that align with your personal goals. We leverage smart tracking, AI-powered insights, and community-driven accountability to make habit-building easy, engaging, and effective.
AboutUs.CTA-Subtext: Start tracking your habits smarter, not harder.

Au-Story.item-1-text: Momentum was born from a simple realization: building good habits is hard, but it doesn't have to be. We wanted to create a habit tracker that adapts to you, not the other way around.
Au-Story.item-2-text: We started developing Momentum with a focus on simplicity, AI-powered insights, and personalized habit tracking. The goal was to make habit-building engaging, not overwhelming.
Au-Story.item-3-text: What started as a side project quickly turned into a movement. Beta users loved the AI-driven insights and community challenges, helping us refine the platform.
Au-Story.item-4-text: Momentum officially launched, empowering thousands of users to take control of their habits. With every update, we continue to innovate and improve.
Au-Story.item-5-text: We're just getting started! More features, deeper insights, and stronger communities are coming. Our mission remains the same: helping you build habits that last.

ContactUs.Subtext: Have a question or feedback? Reach out! Use the form, send us an email, or give us a call—we’re here to help you build better habits.
